sections.heading: Our Mission
sections.content: Our mission is to provide a high-quality, culturally-responsive kindergarten homeschool curriculum that celebrates Black history and culture. We believe in making education accessible, engaging, and meaningful for all families.

sections.heading: The Creators
sections.content: We are a team of passionate educators, historians, and parents dedicated to creating a learning experience that is both academically strong and culturally affirming. We saw a need for a curriculum that places Black history at the core of learning, not just as a footnote in February.

sections.heading: What Problem We Solve
sections.content: Many homeschooling families, especially those in the Black community, struggle to find curricula that reflect their heritage and experiences. Soulful Gospel Learning fills this gap by providing a free, comprehensive program that integrates core subjects with the richness of African American folkways, stories, and historical figures.
